Acompañando al cliente en el desarrollo: Accompanying the client in the development of their activity, providing the best quality of service
En un contexto cambiante en el que la in: In a changing context in which the intervention of the state through its collection agency and in its need for financing through the application of taxes, we see the importance of being advised when developing an activity since it involves investment of capital, work and analysis of different variables, which will allow decisions to be made aiming at maximizing the resources of the company.
Creemos que el asesoramiento al cliente: We believe that client advice as well as their commitment to acquiring new knowledge help to improve the dynamics of the activity carried out and to better client-accountant communication.
Compromiso con la cliente, respeto, conf: Commitment to the client, respect, trust.
En estudiocea nuestro principal objetivo: At estudiocea, our main objective is the client's compliance and approval in terms of advice and support at each stage of the development of the activity, and that they feel that they are working in a team that contains them and that is committed to obtaining results. allowing a better use of company resources accompanied by a minimization of tax expenses.
Compromiso con el cliente, Respeto, Conf: Commitment to the client, Respect, Trust
Estos tres valores implican una relación: These three values ​​imply a relationship with the client that aims to develop teamwork, each fulfilling their role, to achieve results together and aiming at client satisfaction, where communication between both is also important.
Inscripciones y baja de impuestos, Monot: Inscriptions and deregistration of taxes, Monotributo, General Regime (IVA), Monthly and annual tax settlements, Provincial taxes, Accounting certifications.
Recategorización de monotributo, Regular: Monotributo recategorization, Tax regularization, Information Regimes, Response to requirements, AFIP Moratoriums and payment plans.
Despachos Aduaneros, Importación - expor: Customs clearance, Import-export and registrations, Advice on customs documents, TAD- remote procedures, Recovery of export rights and much more.
Estudiocea esta conformado por un conjun: Estudiocea is made up of a group of professionals with experience acquired in important companies and top-level accounting firms. The greatest capital we have is human, since we aim for a fluid and trustworthy professional client interaction that allows us to work efficiently. Ordered with the main objective of achieving customer satisfaction in each of the activities carried out, in this way we consider that each client becomes a fundamental element and their achievements become our achievements.
